title: Handler Manifest Schema
description: Schema for validating handler (agent) manifest frontmatter in Skuld plugin

description.description: Brief description of what this handler does

triggers_on.description: Profile flags that must be true to activate this handler

requires_intake.description: Intake IDs that MUST be collected before invoking this handler

optional_intake.description: Intake IDs that enhance output if present but are not required

progressive_unlock.description: Intake IDs that this handler unlocks for progressive disclosure

allowed-tools.description: Claude Code tools this agent is allowed to use
